Package: org.lenskit.gradle

[Groovy] Class Crossfold

            • org.lenskit.gradle.Crossfold
            • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
              DataSources

              class Crossfold
extends LenskitTask

              Crossfold a data set. This task can only crossfold a single data set; multiple tasks must be used to produce multiple cross-validation splits. In addition to the methods and properties specified in this class, the crossfolder also supports all configuration directives supported by the crossfold operation as defined by CrossfoldSpec. For example, you can say: 

              
 includeTimestamps false
 partitions 10
              See Also:
              CrossfoldSpec
              DataSources
              http

              • Property Detail

                • java.lang.Object outputDir

                  The output directory for cross-validation. Defaults to "build/$name.out", where $name is the name of the task.

                • static PartitionMethodSpec holdout(int n, java.lang.String order = 'random')

                  Utility method to create a holdout-N user partition method.

                  Returns:
                  The partition method.
                  Parameters:
                  n - The number of ratings to hold out for each user.
                  order - The sort order. Defaults to `random`.

                • static PartitionMethodSpec holdout(groovy.lang.Closure block)

                • static PartitionMethodSpec holdoutFraction(double f, java.lang.String order = 'random')

                  Utility method to create a holdout-fraction user partition method.

                  Returns:
                  The partition method.
                  Parameters:
                  f - The fraction of ratings to hold out per user.
                  order - The sort order. Defaults to `random`.
